title: BONK Surges 75% as LetsBonk Overtakes Pumpfun in Trading Volume
summary: BONK token rallied 75% in two weeks as its LetsBonk launchpad exceeded Pumpfun with $411M daily volume, while BONKbot became the top fee-generating Telegram bot at $4.35M monthly revenue. The ecosystem growth includes successful meme launches like USELESS ($20M to $280M) and IKUN (10x in 9 days), plus a $200K hackathon won by BESTCOIN.

title: Pumpfun Token Sale Set for July 12 Exchange Launch
summary: Pumpfun will launch its native PUMP token on exchanges July 12, offering 150 billion tokens at $0.04 USDT valuation. This marks a significant milestone for the popular Solana-based meme coin launchpad platform.

title: Paradigm Leads $11.5M Series A for Kuru Labs' Monad DEX
summary: Kuru Labs secured $11.5M in Series A funding led by Paradigm to develop a DEX on Monad blockchain. The platform features a hybrid CLOB-AMM model combining central limit order books with automated market makers for enhanced liquidity and native limit orders.

title: Metaplanet Purchases 2,205 BTC for $238.7M, Becomes 5th Largest Corporate Holder
summary: Japanese investment firm Metaplanet acquired 2,205 BTC at an average price of $108,237, investing $238.7 million to bring total holdings to 15,555 BTC. This positions Metaplanet as the world's 5th largest publicly listed corporate Bitcoin holder.

title: Elon Musk's American Party to Support Bitcoin, Calls Fiat 'Hopeless'
summary: Elon Musk announced his new American Party will officially support Bitcoin, stating 'fiat is hopeless' in a public declaration. This political endorsement from one of the world's most influential figures could significantly impact crypto adoption and regulation.
